name: sentinel-ai
description: AI-powered code review and analysis tool

scripts.build:clean: pnpm -r run clean && pnpm -r run build
scripts.ci:check: pnpm lint && pnpm type-check && pnpm test -- --run
scripts.sentinel:context:dev: SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts build-context
scripts.sentinel:context: pnpm -r build && SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js build-context
scripts.sentinel:review:dev: SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --diff fixtures/changes.diff
scripts.sentinel:review:nofail:dev: SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts review --diff fixtures/changes.diff --fail-on none
scripts.sentinel:review: pnpm -r build && SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js review --diff fixtures/changes.diff
scripts.sentinel:render-md:dev: SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts render-md
scripts.sentinel:render-md: pnpm -r build && SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js render-md
scripts.sentinel:render-html:dev: SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec tsx src/index.ts render-html --in .sentinel/reviews/frontend/review.json --out .sentinel/reviews/frontend/review.html
scripts.sentinel:render-html: pnpm -r build && SENTINEL_PROFILE=frontend pnpm -F @sentinel/cli exec node dist/index.js render-html
